attributes.action: Either axe or withdraw the last government's Fuel DUTY for 24 months
attributes.additional_details: The cost of manufacturing & transportation of goods to local shop's & businesses would almost halve in a single day. We COULD have more money in our pockets to buy more from local shop's & businesses, more money to spend a day out at. be it at the seaside or a theme park, more money to visit relatives the other side of the country. And all that money we spend would more then cover the cancellation of a tax designed to Rob us of our happiness.
attributes.background: If the current government axed the fuel duty which the last government brought in & has slowly been choking our economy & lives.

rejection.details:
We currently have petitions open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Remove duty on motor fuel completely
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908
